category: Marketing Regulations/Article 15 (Obligations of member sports organizations and provincial/provincial sports councils)
contents: Article 15 (Obligations of member sports organizations and provincial/provincial sports associations) ① When member sports organizations produce competition uniforms for athletes dispatched by the Sports Council, the design and brand must be produced in compliance with the regulations of the relevant competition. ② Member sports organizations and provincial/provincial sports associations are responsible for any damages arising from failure to comply with these regulations, and may receive disadvantageous measures in accordance with the sports association’s articles of association and related regulations.
